articles.title: Supreme Court Seems Ready to Reject Efforts to Kick Trump Off the Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from across the ideological spectrum expressed skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: King Charles diagnosed with cancer, Buckingham Palace announces
articles.description: The King's cancer was discovered during his recent treatment for an enlarged prostate. He has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties, though will continue state business and paperwork.

articles.title: Boeing replaces head of 737 Max program after mid-air panel blowout
articles.description: Boeing removed Ed Clark, the head of its 737 Max program, as part of a management shakeup following the Alaska Airlines door plug incident. Katie Ringgold will take over leadership of the program.
